mapper.select:
SELECT
a.id AS "id", a.supplier AS "supplier.id", a.goods_name AS "goodsName", a.goods_type AS "goodsType", a.unit_price AS "unitPrice", a.goods_num AS "goodsNum", a.total_price AS "totalPrice", a.rec_date AS "recDate", a.purchase_person AS "purchasePerson", a.pay_method AS "payMethod", u2.name AS "supplier.name" FROM purchase_receipt a LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.id = a.supplier
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO purchase_receipt( id, supplier, goods_name, goods_type, unit_price, goods_num, total_price, rec_date, purchase_person, pay_method ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{supplier.id}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsType}, #{unitPrice}, #{goodsNum}, #{totalPrice}, #{recDate}, #{purchasePerson}, #{payMethod} )
mapper.update: UPDATE purchase_receipt SET supplier = #{supplier.id}, goods_name = #{goodsName}, goods_type = #{goodsType}, unit_price = #{unitPrice}, goods_num = #{goodsNum}, total_price = #{totalPrice}, rec_date = #{recDate}, purchase_person = #{purchasePerson}, pay_method = #{payMethod} WHERE id = #{id}
